Title: Establishes a retired employee health insurance premium reserve fund for the town of Saranac
Summary: Establishes a retired employee health insurance premium reserve fund for the town of Saranac to cover retired town employee health insurance premiums, to stabilize the tax rate, and to ensure transparency for the taxpayers and elected officials.
LawCode: Add ยง6-w, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a retired employee health insurance premium reserve fund for the town of Saranac
